name: Gil Fink
bio: Gil Fink is a web development expert, Web Technologies GDE, Microsoft Development Technologies MVP and sparXys CEO. He is currently consulting for various enterprises and companies, where he helps to develop web based solutions. He is also co-author of several Microsoft Official Courses (MOCs) and training kits, co-author of
book (Apress), co-organizer of AngularUP and ReactNext conferences.
